ability.name: Delta Supply
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a basic Energy card or a δ Rainbow Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon that has δ on its card. This power can't be used if Flygon is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

ability.name: Poison Pollen
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Vileplume is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Trainer card in your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Aqua Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Dragonbreath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

ability.name: Delta Support
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Supporter card with Holon in its name in play, you may search your discard pile for a basic Energy card or a δ Rainbow Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. This power can't be used if Chimecho is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Barboach.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

ability.name: Baby Evolution
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.

attacks.name: Paste
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon that has δ on its card.

attacks.name: Steel Headbutt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

cards.name: Crawdaunt ex

ability.name: Splash Back
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if your opponent has 4 or more Benched Pokémon, you may choose 1 of them and return that Pokémon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand. This power can't be used if Crawdaunt ex is affected by a Special Condition.

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Power Blow
attacks.text: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Crawdaunt ex.

cards.name: Mightyena ex

ability.name: Driving Howl
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon and switch it with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Benched Pokémon to switch. This power can't be used if Mightyena ex is affected by a Special Condition.

text: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hyper Claws
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 50 damage plus 40 more damage.
